annotations.normalized_text: U.S. National Library of Medicine National Institutes of Health

text:
@US_FDA Quinine plant considered to be able to treat Corona virus

Chloroquine phosphate may block Covid-19 infections on low micromolar concentrations. The study of the U.S. National Library of Medicine National Institutes of Health showed at least 100 patients successfully healed. https://t.co/HTJMBOZltp

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
